title: Archaic Marketplace
description: 3D-scanned digital twins for artists, powered by NFTs.

body.raw:
**Coming soon.** The Archaic Marketplace is a platform for physical artists to scan works in 3D, mint NFT digital twins, and sell or trade them. Itâ€™s the bridge between traditional art and Web3, built to protect provenance and expand reach.

- Scan physical art in 3D
- Mint as NFT digital twin
- Sell/trade with collectors and fans

_Join the waitlist using the form on this page._
